subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: On May 25, N.F.L. owners will decide whether to play the first open-air cold-weather Super Bowl or return to warm-weather stalwarts like Tampa and South Florida.
snippet: On May 25, N.F.L. owners will decide whether to play the first open-air cold-weather Super Bowl or return to warm-weather stalwarts like Tampa and South Florida.
